results.title: Missed Bin
results.snippet: Waste Services. Missed Bin. It is too early to request a missed bin collection. Our crews are still currently out collecting. Please wait until after 2pm.

results.title: Report a broken or stolen bin - Gedling Borough Council
results.snippet: Use this form to request a larger bin, let us know if your bin has been lost/stolen or if the body of your bin is damaged.

list_analysis.pilot_result:
Based on the provided analysis results and the given context, I have filtered the recommendations to meet the maximum selections and minimum confidence criteria. Here are the top three recommendations that remain:

```json
[
 {
    "Number": "1",
    "Title": "Missed bin - Gedling Borough Council",
    "Source": "https:\/\/www.gedling.gov.uk\/rubbish\/generalwasteinformation\/missedbin\/",
    "Reasoning": "This link appears to be the most helpful resource for users who have missed their scheduled bin collection.",
    "Confidence": "90"
 },
 {
    "Number": "2",
    "Title": "Bins and recycling - Gedling Borough Council",
    "Source": "https:\/\/www.gedling.gov.uk\/rubbish\/",
    "Reasoning": "This resource is relevant to the user's need for council customer information and offers various options to help satisfy their inquiry.",
    "Confidence": "85"
 },
 {
    "Number": "3",
    "Title": "Missed Bin",
    "Source": "https:\/\/apps.gedling.gov.uk\/wasteforms\/form.aspx?requesttype=Missed",
    "Reasoning": "This resource is useful for users who want to promptly report a missed bin collection.",
    "Confidence": "80"
 }
]
```

Explanation: All three recommendations are relevant and offer varying depths of information related to the user's need for council customer information regarding waste management. The recommendation with the highest confidence score, option 1 (Missed bin - Gedling Borough Council), directly addresses the specific case of a missed bin collection, making it an optimal first choice for users who have missed their scheduled pick-up. Options 2 and 3 provide additional, more extensive resources which could also be beneficial to users seeking further information or assistance with other waste management issues. The confidence scores reflect the credibility, relevance, and accessibility of each option, making it easier for users to make informed decisions based on their specific needs.

selected_links.title: Missed bin - Gedling Borough Council
strengths: Directly relevant to the user's need for council customer information about a missed bin.
The page provides useful information and an apology for any inconvenience caused.
selected_links.reasoning: This link appears to be the most helpful resource for users who have missed their scheduled bin collection.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content provides a clear instruction on how to report a missed bin, with a direct link to the council's form for reporting this issue. Also, there is an assurance that each reported missed collection will be investigated within seven working days.
Reason.next_actions: Follow the provided link to report the missed bin.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content effectively addresses the council resident's need for reporting a missed bin. However, some users may find it helpful if there was more information upfront about how to properly prepare their bins for collection (e.g., setting reminders or placing the bin out before a certain time).
